use_case.title: Modify Portal Mission

trigger.value: A Portal Administrator wishes to change the mission statement for a portal

use_case.basic_path:
1. Starting at the Portal, A PA navigates to the Portal Configuration page by clicking the "Configure Portal" link
  2. On the Portal Configuration page, the PA selects the 'basic' tab.
  3. The PA then edits the mission statement for the Portal, and clicks save.
